review.title: “Its a place where management is very flexible”
review.pros: Pros – It is the absolute top firms in designing open space (Public Parks, ...). It has a flexible management. The project at the firm would look very good on ones resume.
review.cons: Cons – You will never find parking near the office. The firm is hearting in the current economy. The office building is old. Management is hesitant to share contacts.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Adopt a more American style firm management. Give percentage to employees who bring in contracts and ask them to bring contracts and clients.
